column1: '''''The Tolkien Diary 2001''''' was a blank diary book featuring illustrations by [[John Howe]].

column2:
A desk diary for the year 2001, containing original paintings based on The Lord of the Rings.

This sumptuous week-to-view desk diary is illustrated with 13 brand new paintings from John Howe, creator of the famous ‘Gandalf’ jacket and designer on the forthcoming Lord of the Rings Movie Trilogy . The paintings are all based on Tolkien’s classic masterpiece, The Lord of the Rings and the overall design of this year’s calendar features input from the artist himself.}}
